column2: "I know this is a desert, but talk about hot."
"Then there are the Volcanic Caverns which are extremely hot too."
"But this is a kind of a dry heat while the caves are more of a steam heat."
"Either one is really too hot, it would be nice to have somewhere cooler."
"Maybe a little cooler, the cold on Naberius' tundra is a little too extreme for me too."
